BR.name: Harvest Moon® 3D: The Tale of Two Towns
BR.description: Há alguns anos, foi construído um túnel entre a aldeia pecuária de Bluebell e a cidade agrícola de Konohana, mas a rixa acirrada entre os dois burgos causou o seu desmoronamento! Construa uma fazenda fervilhante, acalme os ânimos dos aldeões, e talvez você consiga unir essas cidades novamente! Escolha entre duas cidades diferentes, cada uma com seus próprios aldeões, lojas e festivais! Encare missões em ambas as cidades e estabeleça sua reputação como o melhor fazendeiro dos dois lados da montanha!

CA.name: Harvest Moon® 3D: The Tale of Two Towns
CA.description: Years ago, a tunnel connected livestock-loving Bluebell village with the crop-growing town of Konohana, but boisterous bickering between the burgs created a cave-in and collapsed the tunnel! Build a bustling farm, befriend the villagers, and maybe you can find a way to bring these towns together once again! Choose from two different villages, each with their own shops, villagers, and festivals! Take on quests in each town and establish your reputation as the best farmer on both sides of the mountain! Grow crops, raise livestock, woo a spouse, and start a family!

MX.name: Harvest Moon® 3D: The Tale of Two Towns
MX.description: Hace años, un túnel conectaba la villa de ganaderos de Bluebell con el pueblo de agricultores de Konohana, ¡pero las rivalidades entre ambos hicieron que el túnel colapsara! ¡Construye una próspera granja, hazte amigo de los pobladores, y quizás puedas encontrar la forma de amigar a estos pueblos nuevamente! ¡Elige entre dos tipos de villas, cada una con sus propias tiendas, pobladores y festivales! ¡Completa misiones en cada pueblo para crear tu reputación como el mejor granjero en ambos lados de la montaña!

US.name: Harvest Moon® 3D: The Tale of Two Towns
US.description: Years ago, a tunnel connected livestock-loving Bluebell village with the crop-growing town of Konohana, but boisterous bickering between the burgs created a cave-in and collapsed the tunnel! Build a bustling farm, befriend the villagers, and maybe you can find a way to bring these towns together once again! Choose from two different villages, each with their own shops, villagers, and festivals! Take on quests in each town and establish your reputation as the best farmer on both sides of the mountain! Grow crops, raise livestock, woo a spouse, and start a family!
